data.name: InsertSuccess_TestAction.SqlScript
InsertWithNullEmailFails_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
BEGIN TRAN
BEGIN TRY INSERT INTO dbo.[User] (Email, PasswordSalt, PasswordHash) VALUES (null, 'salt', 'hash'); END TRY BEGIN CATCH SELECT 0 END CATCH
ROLLBACK TRAN

data.name: InsertWithNullPasswordHashFails_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
BEGIN TRAN
BEGIN TRY INSERT INTO dbo.[User] (Email, PasswordSalt, PasswordHash) VALUES ('e@mail.com', 'salt', null); END TRY BEGIN CATCH SELECT 0 END CATCH
ROLLBACK TRAN

data.name: InsertWithNullPasswordSaltFails_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
BEGIN TRAN
BEGIN TRY INSERT INTO dbo.[User] (Email, PasswordSalt, PasswordHash) VALUES ('e@mail.com', null, 'hash'); END TRY BEGIN CATCH SELECT 0 END CATCH
ROLLBACK TRAN

data.name: InsertWithDuplicateEmailFails_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
BEGIN TRAN
INSERT INTO dbo.[User] (Email, PasswordHash, PasswordSalt) VALUES ('test30102@domain.com', 'hash', 'salt');
IF @@ROWCOUNT <> 1 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRAN RETURN END
BEGIN TRY INSERT INTO dbo.[User] (Email, PasswordHash, PasswordSalt) VALUES ('TEST30102@domain.com', 'hash', 'salt'); END TRY BEGIN CATCH RETURN END
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 1 BEGIN ROLLBACK TRAN RETURN END
SELECT 0
ROLLBACK TRAN

data.name: NotAllowedToDelete_TestAction.SqlScript
NotAllowedToUpdateEmail_TestAction.SqlScript
AllowedToUpdatePasswordHash_TestAction.SqlScript
data.value:
UPDATE dbo.[User] SET PasswordHash = 'newhash' WHERE UserId = 30100;
IF @@ROWCOUNT = 1 BEGIN SELECT 0 RETURN END
